column4: Am trying to install ubuntustudio from an alternate DVD on hard disk. After i have successfully partitioned and intending to install ubuntustudio i get a "Debootstrap error.. Failed to determine the codename for release". What is the solution?
not to put you off, but there is a #ubuntustudio channel that might be more helpful :)
